title: Buck Island Reef National Monument: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News       Watch 'Caribbean Gem:  Buck Island Reef National Monument' our 2014 Park Film!       We are currently working to improve St. Croix Ground Lizard Habitat on Buck Island. Learn about it here!  In the Spring of 2012 we presented a Draft of our General Management Plan. We continue to review the comments made prior to the May 1, 2012  deadline, and will return to the public with responses to the public's comments in late Spring 2014. http://parkplanning.nps.gov/projectHome.cfm?projectID=11115 We have received substantive comments from our partner and supervisory Virgin Islands and Federal Governmental agencies. Comments can be viewed by clicking below. Virgin Islands and Federal Governmental Agency Comments You can view a February 2014 Newsletter update describing where we are in the Final GMP/EIS drafting process here.       For the Social Media Comment Policy for all three St. Croix parks, click here.
